lexUnit.name: treaty.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A formal agreement between two or more nations governed by international law.

sentence.text: North Korea had proposed signing a " peace and good neighbourliness treaty " with Japan , with which it was technically still at war , to include an apology from Japan for its colonial rule .
